title: Easy chicken dopiaza
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1 teaspoon cumin seed', '2 large onions, chopped', '1 teaspoon ground turmeric', '1 teaspoon cayenne pepper to taste', '1 teaspoon garam masala', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon minced root ginger', '5 tomatoes - peeled, seeded and chopped', '500g (1 1/4 lb) cubed chicken breast meat']
